thread.title: Aamir `manages` to buy daughter Ira's painting
thread.title_full: Aamir `manages` to buy daughter Ira's painting

title: Aamir `manages` to buy daughter Ira's painting
text: Aamir `manages` to buy daughter Ira's painting Monday, 26 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) *New Delhi, Oct 26 (ANI): Aamir Khan is not only Bollywood's perfectionist he is also a doting dad as recently he bought his daughter Ira's one painting during her recent debut art exhibition.* New Delhi, Oct 26 (ANI): Aamir Khan is not only Bollywood's perfectionist he is also a doting dad as recently he bought his daughter Ira's one painting during her recent debut art exhibition. The '3 Idiots' star took to Twitter sharing the picture of the black and white painting he bought and wrote that "My daughter Ira's first exhibition, and I managed to buy this one. It's called 'The Tiger's Nest'. I love it!" Aamir is presently shooting for his upcoming sports drama film 'Dangal', which is a sports biopic. (ANI)
